content: this floral knit top is a beautiful and perfect top for summer the bust is a knit panel in stockinette the flower mesh is crocheted and the back is adjustable it only requires one skein of 4 ply/ fine yarn i used the lanners breeze 100% cotton yarn which is 316m per 100g the pattern is written for a size small/medium but there are notes on adjusting the size if you wish to make it larger or smaller the pattern requires basic knitting and advanced beginner/intermediate crocheting if you have any questions please feel free to dm me on instagram or tiktok my handle for both is @ mooieknits <3
